nitish pattanaik: my simple blog

Introduction: About Me

I'm a computer science student. I try to explore and learn every part of the computer stack. Computer stack refers to the very basic FPGA level programming to the most abstracted programming like UI proramming etc. I try to learn everything about the computing including core cs fundamentals and very advanced os programming.

This is much like a journey for me. I'm not a advanced programmer in this stage. But my goal is to learn every part of the computer stack. And every day I try to learn and upskill myself a little bit everytime.

Interests

  • FPGA
  • hdl, vhdl
  • compilers
  • RISC-v
  • System Programming
  • Serenity OS
  • GUI programming
  • Network Programming
  • Browser Engine
  • Vulnerability Assessment
  • ETC... and Much More
